threadId.description: ID of the thread, @Note:@ If a thread ID is provided, the summary will be generated only for that specific thread.

conversationCount.description: The maximum number of ticket conversations to generate the Ticket Summary. @Note:@ This is only applicable for Ticket Summary; ChatGPT: 1-5 Zia: 1-30.

action.description: To regenerate the response, set the value as @REGENERATE@.

language.description: Set the language of the content. For example, @ENGLISH@ or @SPANISH@.
Set the language of the content. For example, @ENGLISH@ or @SPANISH@.

action.description: To regenerate the reply response, use the action value as @REGENERATE@.

language.description: Language of content. Enter this input in Name language. For example @ARABIC@ , @HEBREW@, @ENGLISH@ etc

context.description: Content that the AI should analyze.

prompt.description: Custom instruction given by the agent.

language.description: Set the language of the content. For example, @ENGLISH@ or @SPANISH@.

apiKey.description: ApiKey from openai to store in platformAI
